name: Marblobolis Grand Prix
description:
If marbles fall along the way, wait for around 20 seconds, the game should move on to the title screen.

This game was made with Unreal Engine 5 for a class at USC.

Contributors:

  • Lizby Dingus https://lizby.info/ 
  • Brendan Hutchins: https://brendanjhutchins.com/
  • Jimi Stine: http://jimistine.com/
